Util Class

class Util

A utility class providing various static methods for common tasks.

try_quit(e)

Handles quitting the game when the quit event or ESC key is triggered.

Parameters:

e – The pygame event.

limit(v, low, high)

Limits the value v within the specified range [low, high].

Parameters:

  • v – The value to be limited.

  • low – The lower bound of the range.

  • high – The upper bound of the range.

Returns:

The limited value.

render_text(text, window, font, color, position)

Renders text on the window using the provided font, color, and position.

Parameters:

  • text – The text to be rendered.

  • window – The game window.

  • font – The font for rendering the text.

  • color – The color of the text.

  • position – The position to render the text.

Returns:

The rendered text surface.

middle(surface, x_offset=0, y_offset=0, x=-1, y=-1)

Calculates the middle position for placing a surface on the screen.

Parameters:

  • surface – The surface to be placed.

  • x_offset – The x-offset from the middle.

  • y_offset – The y-offset from the middle.

  • x – The x-coordinate for a specific position.

  • y – The y-coordinate for a specific position.

Returns:

A tuple representing the calculated position.
